channel.title: Py Humble Games
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Games bundles!

item.title: Happy Holidays with GOG RPGs
item.content:encoded:
Embark on holiday adventures youâ€™ll never forget with this bundle of critically acclaimed RPGs, courtesy of GOG.com! Explore an immersive post-apocalyptic world with boundless depth in the definitive version of the award-winning tactical RPG Wasteland 3: Colorado Collection. Get lost in a lovingly crafted rendition of medieval Bohemia during the Holy Roman Empire in Kingdom Come: Deliverance. Use diplomacy, deception, and force to survive in an uncharted land brimming with ancient magic and precious treasures in Greedfall: Gold Edition. Pay what you want for these RPG masterworks and many more, and help support Code.org with your purchase!

This bundle is limited to one purchase per customer. The option for gifting is not available.

*This bundle requires linking your GOG.com and Humble Bundle accounts in order to redeem the games.

item.title: The Upload VR Showcase - Winter 2023
item.description: Get The Break-In, AMID EVIL VR, Cooking Simulator VR and more!
item.content:encoded:
Don your headset and dive into some of the best VR games out there, in celebration of the UploadVR Showcase Winter 2023! This bundle is brimming with mind-blowing VR experiences across genres and themes, showcasing the medium in all its awe-inspiring variety:

  • Navigate a scorching zombie-infested hellscape with heart-pounding thrills in Arizona Sunshine Deluxe Edition--packed with DLC and other bonus content!
  • Experience the thrill of the heist in the cooperative VR caper The Break-In.
  • Whip up culinary masterpieces step-by-step in the virtual kitchen of Cooking Simulator VR;.
  • Plus five other games in this bundle of VR delights, all in support of buildOn.
